duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize cutting-edge CRM tools to identify and target businesses within the local geographic area.
Cultivate and develop new leads through referral partnerships, networking events, and cold calls.
Understand the unique needs and pain points of each business, and tailor solutions that align with their requirements.
Lead the installation and setup of credit card terminals, POS systems, and payment integration solutions.
Act as a dedicated point of contact for clients, addressing inquiries, troubleshooting issues, and ensuring client satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Valid license and reliable transportation for local travel.
